text: He ase loka hote, je tauba (ksama-yacana) karanare, allahaci upasana karanare, tyaci stuti-prasansa karanare, roja (upavasa-vrata) rakhanare (kinva satya margavara calanare) ruku'a (jhukanare) sajada karanare (matha tekanare), cangalya gostinca upadesa karanare, ani va'ita gostimpasuna rokhanare ani allahacya niyamanna dhyanata rakhanare aheta ani asa imana rakhanaryanna subha samacara dya
